name: Candy Bridge
description:
Game info:

In the happy sweet Candyland, where the liquorice-men live, is the sugar volcano erupting.

You need to build a bridge out of sweets to transport the liquorice-men save to the other riverside. But beware! The bridge is instable and incomplete.

Candy Bridge is a simple casual game:

  • drag and drop candys to build the bridge
  • candys will drop if they aren't attached to others
  • candys will also drop after the liquorice-men has passed by
  • catch falling candys, if they drop into the river they'll disappear
  • after each pass, the liquorice-men will walk faster and you'll get points
  • spend some points for new additional candys

Additional Info:

Candy Bridge was made during a game jam at the college. It was produced in March 2016 within 7 days by 7 students (2nd semester). All credits in game.
